Uses of Class
suncertify.db.DatabaseException

  • Packages that use DatabaseException 
    Package Description
    suncertify.db  

    • Uses of DatabaseException in suncertify.db

      Subclasses of DatabaseException in suncertify.db 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DuplicateKeyException
      The class DuplicateKeyException should be used when a duplicate record is found in the database
      class  RecordNotFoundException
      The class RecordNotFoundException should be used when a record is not found in the database
      Methods in suncertify.db that throw DatabaseException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<SubcontractorRecord> DBFileAccess.getAllSubcontractors()
      Starting at record zero, iterates over each data record and converts it to a SubcontractorRecord object until the end of file is reached.
      static void DBFileAccess.initializeConnection(java.lang.String databasePath)
      This method is called by the constructor of Data passing it the absolute file path to the database.
      void IDatabase.saveData()
      Saves the data to disk when the application terminates
      void Data.saveData() 
      static void DBFileAccess.writeAllSubcontractorsToFile()
      Saves the contents of the cache back to disk.
      Constructors in suncertify.db that throw DatabaseException 
      Constructor and Description
      Data(java.lang.String databasePath)
      Constructs a new Data object.
